data_table.description: Pulmonary Function Test, Original Cohort Exam 19

variable.name: idtype
variable.description: COHORT IDENTIFIER

variable.name: STAND
variable.description: TEST POSITION

variable.name: BP
variable.description: BAROMETRIC PRESSURE IN CENTIMETERS

variable.name: FVC_A
variable.description: FORCED VITAL CAPACITY - TRIAL 1

variable.name: RAT1_A
variable.description: RATIO: FEV1 TO FVC - TRIAL 1

variable.name: FEV1_A
variable.description: FORCED EXPIRATORY VOLUME - TRIAL 1 IN 1.0 SECONDS

variable.name: AST_A
variable.description: EXTRAPOLATED VOLUME EXCEEDS 10% OF THE FVC -TRIAL 1
variable.value: Yes - and no back extrapolation performed before determining FEV1

variable.name: FEV3_A
variable.description: FORCED EXPIRATORY VOLUME - TRIAL 1 IN 3.0 SECONDS

variable.name: RAT2_A
variable.description: RATIO: FEV3 TO FVC - TRIAL 1

variable.name: PEFR_A
variable.description: PEAK EXPIRATORY FLOW RATE - TRIAL 1 (MAXIMUM RATE OF FLOW ATTAINABLE AT ANY TIME DURING AN FEV)

variable.name: MMEF_A
variable.description: MAXIMUM MID EXPIRATORY FLOW RATE - TRIAL 1 (AVERAGE RATE OF FLOW DURING MIDDLE HALF OF AN FEV - IN MILLILITERS EXPIRED PER SECOND)

variable.name: FEF25_A
variable.description: FORCED EXPIRATORY FLOW AFTER 25% OF THE FVC HAS BEEN EXPIRED - TRIAL 1

variable.name: FEF50_A
variable.description: FORCED EXPIRATORY FLOW AFTER 50% OF THE FEV HAS BEEN EXPIRED - TRIAL 1

variable.name: FEF75_A
variable.description: FORCED EXPIRATORY FLOW AFTER 75% OF THE FEV HAS BEEN EXPIRED - TRIAL 1

variable.name: EXT_A
variable.description: NUMBER OF SECONDS THAT ELAPSED BETWEEN THE BACK-EXTRAPOLATED ORIGIN OF THE TRACING AND THE FVC - TRIAL 1

variable.name: TECH_A
variable.description: QUALITY OF BLOW - TRIAL 1

variable.description: FORCED VITAL CAPACITY - TRIAL 1
